entry.title: [RBX3][Private/Public Network] - 42F10 - 42F11
entry.content:
Jun 19, 13:22 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/06/2023 12:28 UTC
End time : 19/06/2023 13:12 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to an malfunction on an electrical equipment

Jun 19, 13:12 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 19, 13:08 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/06/2023 12:28 UTC
Service impact : Some servers on these racks are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G114A20
entry.content:
Jun 19, 04:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/06/2023 03:06 UTC
End Time : 19/06/2023 04:28 UTC
Root cause : Water leak.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 19, 03:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/06/2023 03:06 UTC
Service impact :Some servers in the rack G114A20 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G131A04
entry.content:
Jun 19, 02:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/06/2023 21:43 UTC
End Time : 19/06/2023 00:22 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a circuit-breaker tripping
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 18, 23:33 UTC
Identified - Update : Our teams render the service on most servers. However, there are still 4 servers where hardware replacements need to be carried out before they are accessible again.
Root cause : Incident caused by a circuit-breaker tripping.

Jun 18, 21:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/06/2023 21:43 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack G131A04 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.content:
Jun 19, 00:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/06/2023 23:46 UTC
End Time : 18/06/2023 23:55 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 18, 23:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/06/2023 23:46 UTC
Service impact : Public network in the rack B717B10 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

Host is now healthy

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Room W12 W14 W16
entry.content:
Jun 17, 07:24 UTC
Update - Since friday at 18:20 UTC, we are currently on an emergency electrical distribution on this data Center.
We are available to use this solution for several days. There is no impact on our services
Our technicians are currently working to get back to the main electrical distribution network
We will made situation update on Monday to keep you informed

Jun 17, 06:16 UTC
Update - At this time, we confirmed that all services are operational
Our team are still working to came back to a nominal situation

Jun 16, 20:45 UTC
Monitoring - All the services are currently operational.
We are still running on our backup equipment.
In the meantime, we are still working to restore the service as nominal

Jun 16, 19:29 UTC
Identified - Update : Services are in the process of being restored. Our backup equipments is ensuring continuity of service.
Our teams are working to resolve the situation definitively.

Jun 16, 17:42 UTC
Investigating - Start Time : 16/06/2023 16:47 UTC
Service impacted : Some servers were unavailable.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
